Delegate
Model
Welcome Laura
Let me give you a quick tour...
This is your body. It is composed by parts unified by joints.
My eyes are not as good as yours
So instead of your handsome body i will actually see you like this...
This way i can understand every movement you make
The camera on your phone will be my eyes.
Through them i will see your position, and instruct you how should you move.
But donâ€™t worry you still lead the pace and we will walk through exercises together
I will show you in orange how am i perceiving your movement
Visualize improvement over time.
If you move correctly you will notice that you are in green!
You will also see an indicator of how long you should keep that position
There is not right or wrong attempts, i will record your performance and use this information for the next session!
Sometimes i will need to see you from the front, sometimes from the side to guide you better...
Your phone must be well positioned, but we will come to that later, are you ready?
